name: Representation of Passion
description:
Representation of Passion acknowledges the confused and overwhelming senses that come with passion. The fruits of being in love are reflections of the need to release from traditional boundaries, to connect on a never-explained and almost unknown level.

I connect to my passion
Being that I, a part of me, a part of nature or another being
I connect to this sense
And to the feeling of being whole.
I recognise my mission
To support this feeling and let it live freely
Outside the boundaries of Traditional.
